column2: Mogo, Inc. is a financial technology company. The firm offers a financial health application that offers consumers with simple solutions to help them manage and control their finances. The company allows users to sign up for a MogoAccount and get access to six products including free credit score monitoring, identity fraud protection, digital spending account with Platinum Prepaid Visa Card, digital mortgage experience, the MogoCrypto account, which enables the buying and selling of bitcoin, and access to smart consumer credit products through MogoMoney.
